CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 5, 1953, pg. 2, reads: "Council Meets - The Hill District Community Council at its delegate meeting Monday, devoted itself to the discussion of behavior at agency sponsored dances, preparations for a recreation survey of the area and the possibility of setting up neighborhood units which could deal with local problems in the area where they occur.  Those who participated included Mrs. Charlotte Catlin, Ammon Recreation Center; Miss Doris Keller, Soho Community House; the Rev. John Fey, pastor, Faith Lutheran Church; Mrs. Helen Franklin, Schenley Heights Service Club; George Welch, Ebony League; Mrs. Hilda Thornton, Sixth District Community Club; Mrs. Douglas, Harriet Tubman Guild; Charles Daniels, Ushers Alliance; Miss Jean Lee, Bureau of Community Councils; Kenneth Scott, Mrs. Charles Pace, Herron Hill PTA; Albert Tyndall, Centre Avenue YMCA; Mrs. Charles S. Butcher, Mrs. Ernestine Parks, Mrs. Clarence Swain, Mrs. Anna Townes, Mrs. and Mrs. A. Z. Pittler, Mrs. Ethel Hampton and Carl Redwood. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Hill District Community Council members including Charlotte Enty Catlin, Doris Keller, Rev. John Fey, Helen Franklin, George Welch, Hilda Thornton, Mrs. Douglas, Charles Daniels, Jean Lee, Kenneth Scott, Mrs. Charles Pace, Albert Tyndall, Mrs. Charles S. Butcher, Ernestine Parks, Mrs. Clarence Swain, Anna Townes, A. Z. Pittler, Mrs. Pittler, Ethel Hampton, and Carl Redwood, gathered for meeting in Centre Avenue YMCA
